items.sentence: I came all this way. You could at least listen to what I have to say.
If I tell my mother, she\'ll worry, so I don\'t think I\'ll tell her.
Tom can\'t even play one song on his ukulele without making mistakes.
I put an advertisement in the newspaper saying my house was for sale.
I remember the event as clearly as if it had happened just yesterday.
I suggest that you go and see a doctor about this as soon as you can.
I think that perhaps both Tom and Mary have forgotten how to do that.
I want to apologize for the way I talked to you the last time we met.
I think I\'ve figured out which horse is most likely to win the race.
I\'ve heard that in Germany beer is cheaper than water. Is that true?
